item.name: ERR_NOT_PREPARE_RECOVERY_FSTAB
item.solution: Prepare a recovery.fstab in current project directory !

item.name: ERR_NOT_OTA_PACKAGE
item.solution: Prepare a ota.zip in current project directory !

item.name: ERR_OTA_INCOMPATIBLE
item.detail: The ota.zip is a incompatible ota package.
item.solution: Check whether META-INF and system directory are in ota.zip

item.name: ERR_MISSION_FAILED
item.detail: Mission Failed, as catching a Runtime Error.

item.name: ERR_NOT_PREPARE_RECOVERY_IMG
item.solution: Prepare a recovery.img or recovery.fstab in current project directory !

item.name: ERR_NOT_PREPARE_BOOT_IMG
item.solution: Prepare a boot.img in current project directory, Or not set boot in vendor_modify_images[Makefile] !
